detail_desc: Lace Brazilian briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and half-string back.

Soft, non-wired bras in ribbed cotton jersey with unlined triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, narrow elastication at the back and no fasteners.
Longer shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in a loose rib knit with a deep neckline and twisted detail at the back.
Wide jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lined bandeau bikini top with side support and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, tie-top shoulder straps, and straps that tie at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Super push-up lace bra with decorative straps at the front and underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim in a slightly looser fit with a high waist, button fly and straight legs.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
V-neck top in cool satin with lace at the top, spaghetti shoulder straps and a lace racer back with covered buttons.
Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.

Set with a top and joggers in washed-look sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend. Top with a press-stud at the back, long raglan sleeves with sewn-in ribbing down the outsides, a kangaroo pocket with sewn-in ribbing, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and legs with sewn-in ribbing and elasticated hems.

Shirt woven in a cotton blend with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Knee-length sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, and a key pocket in the waistband. Unlined.

T-shirt in hard-washed slub cotton jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline and seam centre back. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Shirts in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Waist-high hipster briefs in lace and mesh with a lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine, airy knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-cut dress in printed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Prolong the life of your favourite clothes. Mend, patch and continue to wear them. The patches can be ironed onto garments.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Wide jumper in a soft, loose rib knit with dropped shoulders, sleeves that end just above the wrist with sewn-in turn-ups, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Blouse in airy plumeti chiffon with a lace-trimmed collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, a small flounce at the shoulders and a seam at the top with decorative gathers. Long sleeves with a frill trim and button at the cuffs. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and a wide flounce at the cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a fabric badge at the top, jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in a viscose weave with smocking at the top and long raglan sleeves. Narrow elastication and a wide flounce at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Knee-length, A-line dress in jersey with a gathered seam and flounce at the hem for added volume. Unlined.
T-shirts in soft jersey. The cotton content of the T-shirts is organic.
Body in microfibre with a gentle sculpting effect on the waist, seat and hips. Detachable shoulder straps, a lined top and a lined gusset.
Straight-cut utility jacket in soft cotton canvas with a collar and buttons down the front. Open chest pocket with an appliqué, large flap front pockets and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Calf-length, ribbed jersey dress with a V-neck, press-studs at the top, long sleeves and slits in the sides.
Half-shaft wellingtons with a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Metal chain necklaces with a trigger clasp. Two of the necklaces have a metal pendant. Length 56 cm, 61 cm and 71 cm.
Blouse in airy mesh with a shimmering pattern. Small, gathered stand-up collar with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves. Unlined.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave. Extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly with a concealed button, diagonal side pockets and jetted back pockets. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Set with a hat and pair of mittens in a jacquard knit. Fleece-lined hat with a pompom on top, ear flaps and ties under the chin. Mittens with foldover ribbing at the top. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in jersey made from a soft cotton blend. Top with a V-neck and button placket. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist.
Fully lined lace bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides and high cut at the back.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned fleece that fasten down the front and along one leg. Ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Small hair elastics in different colours. No metal clips. Diameter 6 cm.
Sleeveless jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a ribbed polo neck and narrow ribbing around the armholes and hem.
Warm-lined boots in shiny imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 2 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Joggers in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and ribbed hems.

Short, sleeveless, halterneck dress in a crêpe weave with a deep V-neck and long shoulder straps that can be tied in various ways. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a flared skirt. Lined.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and raw-edge hems.
Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with lace. Opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads, elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist.
Sleeveless, loose-fitting top in an airy, patterned weave with fringing. Opening and a button at the back of the neck. Unlined.
Trousers in an airy weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Short skirt in sturdy cotton twill with a high waist, detachable tie belt, wrapover front with a concealed fastening and a patch front pocket with a flap.
Short, sleeveless dress in jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Fully lined joggers in soft, stretch denim made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly and fake diagonal front pockets. Cotton jersey lining. Some of the cotton content of the denim is recycled.
A-line, round-necked dress in viscose crêpe with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, long sleeves with a seam and flounce at the top and elasticated cuffs. Unlined.
Shaftless socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.
Jumper knitted in soft cotton with a lined, drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved body in lace and mesh with a deep V-neck front and back and lined gusset with press-studs.
Blouse in a crinkled weave containing glittery threads with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with a frill trim around the shoulders. Lined.
Round-necked playsuit in pleated jersey with a sheen. Raglan butterfly sleeves, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and raw edges at the sleeves and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, pile-lined hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, a chin guard, front pockets and elasticated cuffs. Partly lined in fleece.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a linen and viscose weave with a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Oval sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Long shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, A-line dress in jersey crêpe with gathers and a small frill trim at the top and tie-top shoulder straps. Seam below the bust and at the hem with wide, tiered flounces.

Set with a long-sleeved, wrapover bodysuit and a pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a text print on the front and press-studs at the sides and at the crotch. Trousers with an elasticated waist.
Cropped vest top in ribbed jersey with metal press-studs down the front.
Short, straight-cut dress in soft jersey with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
